name: New Beginnings (Elijah Nutter)
description:
No matter what unfortunate event happens in your life, you can get better. You can rise to new beginnings. A game for Global Game Jam 2021. The theme was lost and found.

Play Note: Navigate through the different platforms to reach the stars and progress through a story to find happiness.

Controls: 

Mouse: Look
WASD: Move
Space: Jump
Hold Space (on wall): Wall Run
Space Twice (unlock): Double Jump
R: Restart Area
E: Interact With Star
Esc: Quit Game

Credits:

Marissa Williams - Artist / Technical Artist

Eimy Choy - Artist / Environment 

Benjamin Branch - Lead / Sound

Elijah Nutter - Programmer / Designer
